room_title: Escape room "Berserk Hotel" by Junkyard Escape in Lincoln
room_description:
You and your friends’ car broke down in the middle of nowhere. You have to find a place to stay until the next morning. After walking a couple miles, you see an uninhabited hotel and decide to spend the night there.
As soon as you enter the abandoned reception hall, the door locks and you and your friends are trapped inside. Unfortunately, you don’t know that this hotel has a wicked history... A girl has disappeared here under mysterious circumstances. Legends say that she was murdered by supernatural creatures
and her soul is trapped inside of the hotel. Discovering Annabelle’s soul along with other hidden clues is the only way out!
